translated: The Book of Conditional Relations🔽The Chapter on the Triad🔽The Section on the Triad in Direct and Reverse Order

original: Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3)🔽15.43. Cittasamuṭṭhānaduka, Kusalattika🔽Cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanocittasamuṭṭhāno nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya  citta samuṭṭhāna duka kusala ttika  citta samuṭṭhānam kusalam dhammam paṭicca na no citta samuṭṭhānaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
translated: The Dyad on What is Derived from Primary Elements

original: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanocittasamuṭṭhāno naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Abyākatamūlaṁ tīṇiyeva paccayavasena.)
analyzed: citta samuṭṭhānam akusalam dhammam paṭicca na no citta samuṭṭhānaḥ na akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi abyākata mūlam tīṇi eva paccaya vasena
